name: queryEvery
description: Executes a callback/closure against every row in a query and returns true if the callback/closure returned true for every row.

examples.title: All values greater than 50
examples.description: Find out if every value in the query is greater than 50
examples.code:
<cfscript>
data = query(foo: [51,52,535]);
allGT50 = queryEvery(function(row){ return row.foo > 50; });
</cfscript>
